title: Custom Bracelet | Personalized Gift | Design Your Own Jewelry | Custom Jewelry | Personalized Gift | Birthday Gifts For Her |
description: Design Your Own Personalized Custom Custom Cuff Bracelet| ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS CAN BE FOUND BELOW AND BY SCROLLING THROUGH THE PHOTOS ABOVE |Korena Loves chose stainless steel as the medium for our personalized jewelry for several reasons.  Stainless steel jewelry is sustainable and eco-friendly.  It’s known for its durability, making our jewelry long-lasting and reusable. It is resistant to tarnishing, fading, and corrosion, ensuring that your personalized engraving will stay beautiful. Additionally, stainless steel is a recyclable material, making it an environmentally friendly choice. By choosing Korena Loves stainless steel jewelry, you're not only investing in a timeless piece, but you're making a sustainable choice that helps to reduce waste.  We strive to craft gifts as unique and special as those receiving them and we hope you will feel good about gifting them. Spending our days surrounded by inspirational quotes of faith, love and happiness is our business and our joy.  May they bring joy to those who receive them as well. Thank you so much for visiting our shop.| VERY IMPORTANT PLEASE REVIEW THESE INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY PRIOR TO ORDERING |►  All of our items start off blank, the photos are meant for examples and inspiration only.►  Your custom jewelry will be made to order based on the specifications you provide during checkout.►  We carry no standing inventory and produce our jewelry only when ordered.►  Our engraver doesn’t have a proof mechanism, so production will generally begin without additional contact.►  Keep in mind custom crafted jewelry is seldom perfect or evenly spaced. Font and graphic sizes will vary based on character counts and graphic requests. These characteristics are all part of the charm and should not be considered defects.►  As each item is custom produced uniquely for you, refunds and exchanges are not available unless an error was made by Korena Loves.►  We are unable to accept cancellation or change requests after your item has begun the first stage of production.| CUSTOMIZATION & PERSONALIZATION |►  All Korena Loves jewelry begins blank and is made to order.►  Your instructions should be added to the personalization field provided when you load the item into your cart►  Our cuffs are priced by the width. Before purchasing please be sure you have selected a bracelet with the appropriate width/price to accommodate your text.►  The cuff width in the main photo is the width you are purchasing.  If you desire a different width, please purchase from a different listing with the width you desire in the main photo.►  We recommend no more than 60 characters of text including spaces per line.►  Our standard 6” cuff will fit most woman and is slightly adjustable the first time it is worn. Keep in mind these are true cuffs and meant to open in the back.- 1" cuffs hold up to 5 lines and are available in the standard 6” length only, this size will fit most woman- 1/2" cuffs hold up to 2 lines and are also available in a 5" length for smaller wrists and a 7" length for men & women with larger wrists- 3/8” & 1/4” cuffs hold 1 line and are also available in a 5" length for smaller wrists| ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS |►  Below are a few simple and concise examples of how best to share your personalization instructions:►EXAMPLE ONEOUTSIDE:  Border M with the name SarahLEFT END:  3rd heartRIGHT END: Love, MomINSIDE: Quote shown in main photo►EXAMPLE TWOOUTSIDE: Border 3LEFT END: leave blankRIGHT END: leave blankINSIDE: I love you more►EXAMPLE THREENEED 5” LENGTH FOR SMALL WRISTSOUTSIDE: Border A with text Psalm 46:5LEFT END: 3rd CrossRIGHT END: Love, Aunt RoseINSIDE: God is with her, she will not fall| WEAR & CARE |►  Cuff bracelets should only be “sized” to your wrist the first time you wear them by gently opening or pinching the ends. After that, rather than bending the metal, simply slide the opening over the narrowest part of your wrist and then gently turn into the cuff. This will avoid overworking the metal so you’ll have a lasting treasure.►  Surgical grade stainless steel may contain some nickel, but is generally considered hypoallergenic for most people.►  Stainless steel jewelry is harder than silver and doesn’t usually tarnish, rust or require a lot of special care, however it can scratch. We recommend storing in it’s box, an individual bag or pouch. If your jewelry does get scratched, you may wish to contact a local jeweler for a professional polish.► Wash by dipping a soft, lint-free cloth in warm soapy water, and then gently wipe. Dry well with a clean cloth. Follow up with a jewelry polishing cloth for a nice shine.Don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns.Korena Loves | Personalized Jewelry | Personalized Gift | Personalized Bracelet | Gift Ideas | Gifts for Her

title: No words just hugs candle / Gift Box for Her Him / Sending you hugs in candle / Thinking of you gifts Gift for friend Get Well Soon Sympathy
description: The "Hugs Candle" Gift Box is a heartfelt expression of warmth and comfort, carefully curated for those special individuals in your life who could use an extra dose of love. With a focus on conveying empathy and support, this thoughtfully designed gift box offers a unique way to send solace and affection to friends, family, or acquaintances during challenging times.This set comes in a pretty package and includes mini matches in a cute jar.Enclosed within the elegantly crafted package is a specially crafted soy candle that embodies the essence of a warm embrace, designed to soothe and provide a sense of reassurance. The candle exudes a delicate yet calming aroma, filling the air with a subtle blend of comforting scents that evoke feelings of tenderness and understanding.While words may sometimes fall short in expressing emotions, the "Hugs Candle" Gift Box speaks volumes through its gentle presentation and the symbolic gesture of a candle, symbolising hope and light during dark moments. Whether it's to offer solace during times of grief, convey well wishes for a swift recovery, or simply to let someone know they are cherished, this gift serves as a token of heartfelt connection and support.With its understated elegance and profound sentiment, the "Hugs Candle" Gift Box transcends mere material offerings, encapsulating the profound essence of empathy, compassion, and solidarity. It is a reminder that, even in moments of sorrow or difficulty, the warmth of a virtual hug can provide a glimmer of comfort and strength, helping to illuminate the path toward healing and renewal.The candle's burn time is approximately 25 hours.We use:Natural, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Non-Toxic Soy Wax100 % cotton wickAll jars have a slightly rustic look and can have slight marks on the glassware.OUR Fragrance List- Fig & Lotus- Strawberries & Cream- Candy Cane- Lavender- Pomegranate- Christmas Spice- Cedarwood & Jasmine- Amber and Sweet Orange- Cosy Winter Night- Pumpkin Spice- GingerbreadWarning: Never leave a burning candle unattended. Burn candles out of reach of children and pets. Always leave at least 10cm between burning candles. Do not burn a candle on or near anything that can catch fire. Only burn this candle on a level heat-resistant surface.Never burn this candle for more than 4 hours at a time. Do not allow the flame to touch the glass. Always burn for 3-4 hours on the first burn to ensure an even melt pool. Ensure the wick is upright, above the wax and central before the wax sets. Always trim the wick to 5mm before lighting to avoid smoking and damage to the glass. The glass may become hot during use. Extinguish when 5mm of wax is left and do not relight. Keep away from draughts.

We can offer our vinyl record design for any song words - words may be capped at around 300 which is sufficient for most songs.HOW DO I PERSONALISE MY ITEM?Our ‘solid vinyl record label’ print can be personalised in any way by adding things to make it special for your event. We ask you to let us know:•	Colour for label•	Artist & SongThen for the label we need:•	Name/s (for top section)•	Date (for released date, right of label under the 45)•	Occasion or event (for top curved line ‘released under licence on XXX recordings)We can also add a longer message underneath the record in oh-so funky retro font to go with the vintage feelThe full text around the edge reads "RELEASED UNDER LICENSE ON XXX RECORDINGS : PRINTED IN CELEBRATION :  ORIGINAL ARTWORK MANUFACTURED AND DESIGNED BY HARLEY DOGS DESIGNS" this can be altered on request.Please see our examples and just add the personalisation as we ask for it during checkout and our designers will work their magicWe can also accommodate other requests if you have specific needs for the custom printCAN I HAVE MY ITEM SENT DIRECT?Of course! We offer a gift wrap upgradePlease note if you purchase the gift wrap option your note will be printed on a kraft gift tagNotes added to orders with no additional gift wrap are sent on plain paper.WHAT'S THE OCCASION?Our personalised song lyrics vinyl record is a romantic design making it great for a wedding, anniversary, Christmas or valentine's or of course a birthday for your husband or wife, brother, Dad or best friend.We have made 1000s of song lyrics prints for every occasion we can think of from births to bar-mitzvahs and you can rely on us to deliver stunning artwork for your event.WHAT HAPPENS NEXT?We are SUPER-FAST ... Once we receive all the details for your order we will send you a preview via Etsy in 1-2 working days to review.Once approved your item will be printed subject to any changes you may need.All our products are hand finished in our UK studio by our professional design team and will be printed and posted within 1-2 working days.MADE FROM240gsm brilliant white matt photopaper25x25cm frame standard deep edged with a perspex front32x32cm frame are standard deep edged with perspex frontsA4 Print is 21x30cm and DOES NOT come with a frameA2 Print is 42x59cm and DOES NOT come with a frameA1 Print is 59x84cm and DOES NOT come with a frameDIMENSIONS25x25x3.5cm framed OR 32x32x3.5cm framedCODEHDPRINT0040DISCLAIMERSome personalisation requests may mean we have to shuffle the design around a little but we will try to make it as close as possible to the example.All 'PRINT ONLY' options do not come with a frame ... hence 'PRINT ONLY'© Harley Dog Designs All Rights Reserved 2021
